labs.title: Ticket Triage Exercise
labs.description: Practice categorizing and prioritizing incoming tickets based on urgency, impact, and user context.

labs.title: Knowledge Base Article Creation
labs.description: Transform resolved tickets into searchable KB articles with proper formatting and keywords.

labs.title: Windows Safe Mode Recovery
labs.description: Boot into various safe mode options and perform system recovery operations.

labs.title: User Profile Migration
labs.description: Migrate user data and settings between profiles or machines using built-in tools.

labs.title: IP Configuration Diagnostics
labs.description: Use command-line tools to diagnose and fix common IP configuration issues.

labs.title: DNS Troubleshooting
labs.description: Identify and resolve DNS resolution failures using systematic testing.

labs.title: Batch File Basics
labs.description: Create simple batch scripts for repetitive help desk tasks like clearing caches or mapping drives.

labs.title: PowerShell One-Liners
labs.description: Learn essential PowerShell commands for AD queries and system information gathering.

labs.title: NTFS Permissions Audit
labs.description: Review and document file/folder permissions to identify access issues.

labs.title: Account Lockout Investigation
labs.description: Trace the source of account lockouts using event logs and lockout tools.
